case.name: SZEUI v Minister for Immigration and Citizenship [2008] FCA 1338 (29 August 2008)

citances.sentence: 48 Therefore, whether or not the appellant was put on notice by the Second Tribunal decision or not (see SZEUI v Minister for Immigration and Citizenship [2008] FCA 1338) , the Third Tribunal certainly did raise in a timely and appropriate way the issue of his membership of AL.
